Sorry for being "that guy", but I've never tried to torrent and play a PS3 game. I'm new to owning a PS3 altogether. Can someone please help me figure out what I need to do with my PS3 before I can play one of these? Much appreciated =]

@jbe1114
You need to have a PS3 with official firmware version 3.55 or below(OFW 3.55, OFW 3.44, etc.)

Then you need to install custom/modified firmware over it(CFW 3.55, CFW 4.21, CFW 4.25)

After that, you need to download the games and place the game folders onto your PS3 via USB or buy an external hard drive and store all the PS3 game folders on it and leave it hooked up to the console.

If on CFW 3.55, you need to copy/paste a patch into the game's folders. Any CFW above it does not require a patch.

Get more information at psx-scene
